alert.note: Alert for Humphreys (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:40PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Humphreys County through 415 PM CDT... At 340 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hurricane Mills, or 11 miles south of Waverly, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waverly, McEwen and Hurricane Mills. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 142 and 148. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
